General.Name: London Finance and Investment Group PLC
General.Description: London Finance & Investment Group P.L.C., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an investment finance and management company. It primarily invests in smaller U.K. quoted companies, which are balanced by a general portfolio that consists of investments in U.S., U.K. and European equities. The general portfolio includes interest in food and beverage, oil, natural resources, chemicals, and tobacco sectors. The firm is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Ely Place,, London, United Kingdom, EC1N 6RY
